website_summaries.verdict: HP's Pavilion Gaming 15 is a respectable contender in the ultra-competitive arena for 1080p gaming laptops priced just north of $1,000, but it falls in the quarterfinal or semifinal round instead of reaching the championship.
pros: Capable 1080p gaming at high image-quality settings
cons: Max-Q GPU rather than full-strength GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
Lackluster 60Hz instead of 144Hz display in test unit

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Great pc, was a bit septic about the keyboard with all the lights that shows in the pictures. I think the pictures don’t do any justice to this product, it looks class, good quality overall, you can see it’s not cheap plastic, the green looks great. When it comes to the specs, speakers are great, specially for a laptop, I use it manly for editing, photoshop, lightroom, bridge, .... and it works great, I can even have them open at the same time. WiFi also is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Nuno Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for gaming and normall computer stuff. Key board illumination green when on, looks fabulous! Great size screen and easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: GaleyH

customer_reviews.title: Won't wake up
customer_reviews.text: Machine goes into sleep mode and will not wake. Power down and restart each time. Slight improvement after HP Support directed me to latest BIOS upgrade - now it will sleep up to about 5 mins, any longer and does not wake up. Support cannot give a positive answer about problem so will be returning the machine for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: captain covehithe

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: 4600 h is a beast of a chip, the 1650 is good for gaming, the system at 650 is a great bargain. If your looking a very good productivity machine well here it is, if your looking a good gaming laptop on a budget here it also is. Only grip is the info is wrong on the item, the usb c doesn't support display port modes but I was able to buy a cheap usb 3 to vga adaptor and plug in my second monitor. Overall this is a great laptop for anyone, never mind on a budget :)
customer_reviews.author: CriticO

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but overall happy.
customer_reviews.text: An entry gaming laptop for a reasonable price. Had some issues with playing videos in chrome, disabled the hardware acceleration and fixed it. Also when i use headphones there is a 2 sec delay before sound stars, seems to be related with power saving measures. Also had to update the graphics drivers for vega gpu manually, automatic update failed. Played games, used it for work, nice screen and fast enough. Good laptop for eveyday use if you are on budget. If you want to game seriously spend the same amount for a desktop pc.
customer_reviews.author: Modios

customer_reviews.title: First impressions and I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Fastest I have ever set up a laptop or windows device and I have setup many macs and PC’s in my life. Great screen supports free sync. Noticed new context menu run with built or high performance graphics. Not all apps have this. For example downloaded and installed Roblox did. roblox from the Microsoft App Store never. Can’t see anywhere to set a default . These are more OS or use issues than the laptop. Laptop seems well laid out, thinner than expected nice casing if somewhat plasticy. Does seem fast. First impressions better than expected and impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.

customer_reviews.title: Advertised wrong
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the laptop. Its fast and efficient the only Negative is that its advertised as a 8gb ram when actually it has 6gb.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Frewin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little laptop, plays top new games easily on high to ultra settings and Screen and keyboard are well lit. I have a few issues but nothing as a deal breaker. 1 - Battery power isn't the best, but I do realise playing games will drain it fast but it only lasts 1 hour. 2 - Only 2 USB ports and only USB 2.0 3 - Only a 250gb hard drive. Apart from those 3 things that can all be worked around this laptop is a brilliant machine that can handle anything you throw at it, I highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ey Up Pete

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The laptop looks amazing. Very sleek. The colour scheme is very nice. The display is also great. Very fast and handles games very well. Very quick to start up after shut down. I have encountered one problem which seems to be caused by the presence of two graphics adaptors, whenever I would unlock the laptop with a browser open the laptop would then bluescreen. The only solution I found for this was disabling the AMD Radeon display through Device Manager. I switch it on whenever I need the extra power for gaming. But otherwise, a good laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product way better than my last laptop. Where I work the broadband isn’t great. This gaming laptop prioritises whatever you have on the screen at the time with the most bandwidth.
customer_reviews.author: jeremycarter

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable hardware
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst laptops I ever had. I keep getting the blue screen of death due to hardware failure all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Oleksiy

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Batterie flat in 30min, computer slow. I have requested refund 20 days ago, customer service is useless and just postponing the refund of the item. Poor product but more importantly really really poor customer service
customer_reviews.author: victorien du pouget

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged my Asus TUF laptop for this because it was faulty and let me tell you this has exceeded it on every level! The only thing it lacks is the screen resolution isn't as good but it's still great and the size of the screen is massive even though it's only 15.6. Great for gaming, runs Sims 4 and WOW on the highest settings with ease. It's great for work as well so your definitely getting the best of both worlds. Don't waste your money on the other brands. Go HP!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered, stealth black version of this (difference is keyboard back lit and hp logo at the back is white. It's ryzen 4600h, gtx 1650, 8 GB 3200 mhz ram and 256gb m.2 SSD. It's really good performing in all aspects, specially I'm surprised with the battery performance in normal use without gaming, you can really see 5 hours no problem. I added one SSD also, but only bad side is the material quality. It's so cheap material plastic. Not for the keyboard side but when you open the back for the change something inside you will understand.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Akdeniz

customer_reviews.title: technical issues
customer_reviews.text: There are issues with the graphics drivers, I'd advise to update them as soon as you start up the laptop, otherwise it will start crashing
customer_reviews.author: Samanta

customer_reviews.title: A superb machine
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this laptop is amazing. A solid 60 FPS on the latest titles on a crisp HD display. One recommendation would be to invest in a ssd. The 250gb isn’t enough. The unit does get hot when playing for more than 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Peter Dunkerley

customer_reviews.title: Really chuffed with this
customer_reviews.text: Great bit of kit for the price - I was able to able to kit my daughter out with a laptop for secondary school for not a lot of cash, but it still had enough oomph for some gaming (after homework!). She's chuffed, I'm chuffed, now she'd better do her homework!
customer_reviews.author: Bennie

customer_reviews.title: I am an animation and motion graphics artist,
customer_reviews.text: and this worked well for me so far (I use Adobe After Effects, Adobe Animate and Adobe Premiere Pro). I haven't tried it for games as this is not what I bought it for; but for those who like me wish something to work at home, this is a setup to start with on a budget. I haven't tried how 3d software works with this one yet, but all 2d options have been running well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my laptop, I don't think I can expect more from it given the price and specs. It has handled everything I threw at it thus far, Witcher3, Dota2, Apex, Skyrim with no big issues. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop. Weird keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop for the price The only letdown is the keyboard. not the feel, but the layout. It has a US layout but with a UK print which makes typing on it very confusing a lot of the time
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel after less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the laptop overall. There's no way to change the time it takes for the back-light on the keyboard to turn off. Sometimes it seems a bit quick to turn off, but that's my opinion. Everything runs well on max settings, though I don't play many intensive games so that was to be expected. Would be 5 stars but I've noticed a dead pixel near the middle of the screen after less than 4 months. Not a big issue but given that it's brand new It's rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what it says it will. Good screen. Good keybord. Sufficient ports, fast processor
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says it will. Good screen. Good keyboard. Sufficient ports, fast processor, Probably does more than I need, but def does what I do need.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for me as a present. I am over the moon at how good it is. Best laptop I have had.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within hours
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with the blue screen of death after updating, but then i reset my computer, did the same updates and everything is fine now, i believe this was due to windows 10 being stupid again and having faulty updates, it works great and lets me emulate ps2 and ps3 games while also playing new generation games! would highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Coby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Battery drains in under an hour and takes several hours to reach 100% charge. For a gaming laptop it overheats very easily and struggles to play games. Often get a blue screen telling me something is wrong with the laptop and it needs to restart. Not had it long and to be honest it’s been a lot of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and fast, light and easy to use. Nice keyboard with solid keys. I use this for graphics work and there are no freezes or delays. Highly recommended machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. James

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play total war warhammer and it runs great. Love the green lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spec
customer_reviews.text: Hi this is a step forward from my previous hp laptop. Bought because I wanted to future proof as well as benefit from faster speeds. Great graphics, good responses, I use it for video editing and zoom more than games but seems to cope well.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Really great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Really good laptop which can be used for multiple purposes. Only downside is it doesn't have the longest battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very good laptop with some small issues.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for gaming, and it is small enough to be carried around. A small issues of occasional freezing screen during gaming. Battery ran out quickly if playing games.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for price.
customer_reviews.text: Low budget gaming laptop , but feels more like a mid range one just don't play games without charger near buy, battery drains fast.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price and is more than suitable for a casual gamer
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for everyday use and gaming. Have had no issues with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe M

customer_reviews.title: Not great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Not Ideal for gaming a lot of titles it won't play had to return it a build a new pc instead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent CPU. Faster boot time very good value for money

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and casual gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A really good, budget, gaming laptop for casual gamers. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Serge
